org.webcurator.domain
Interface RejReasonDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
RejReasonDAOImpl
public interface RejReasonDAO

The Rejection Reason DAO provides access to rejection reason data from the persistent data store.

Author:
oakleigh_sk
